ValidationRule.description: Update the status under Project Unit.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: And( CreateDate__c >= DATE(2021,01,01), OR(AND( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Unit Booked') , !ISNULL( RW_Project_Unit__c ), OR(ISPICKVAL( RW_Project_Unit__r.RW_Unit_Status__c , 'Blocked'), ISPICKVAL( RW_Project_Unit__r.RW_Unit_Status__c , 'Hold'), ISPICKVAL( RW_Project_Unit__r.RW_Unit_Status__c , 'Documentation Complete')) ), AND( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Unit Blocked') , !ISNULL( RW_Project_Unit__c ), OR(ISPICKVAL( RW_Project_Unit__r.RW_Unit_Status__c , 'Booked'), ISPICKVAL( RW_Project_Unit__r.RW_Unit_Status__c , 'Documentation Complete')) ), AND( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Documentation Complete') , !ISNULL( RW_Project_Unit__c ), OR(ISPICKVAL( RW_Project_Unit__r.RW_Unit_Status__c , 'Blocked'), ISPICKVAL( RW_Project_Unit__r.RW_Unit_Status__c , 'Hold'), ISPICKVAL( RW_Project_Unit__r.RW_Unit_Status__c , 'Booked')) ) ), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_opp == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please update this stage under Project Unit.
